name: Neato Robotics XV Series Pet and Allergy Upgrade Kit

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Pet and Allergy Upgrade Kit
reviews.reviewText: What an unbelievable difference changing the filter and brush did to the effective was of our Neato vacuum. We should have changed them months ago. Instead of pet hair and dirt getting stuck, the dirt canister now is full.
reviews.title: Made our Neato function like new!

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Pet and Allergy Upgrade Kit
reviews.reviewText: I own two the the Neato Robatic vacuums. They have been running every day for more than two years. I use the pet and allergy brushes as I also have two dogs and a cat. While I recommend the standard brush if you do not have pets, I highly recommend the pet and allergy brushes if you have pets. The same applies for the allergy filter. While the standard filter is very good the allergy filter captures far more of the allergens.
reviews.title: Much better than the carpet brush if you have pets

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Pet and Allergy Upgrade Kit
reviews.reviewText: The Neato pet and allergy upgrade has made the unit much quieter and it picks up dirt without a question. The new brushes are worth the expense.
reviews.title: Came as promised and quality has been as described

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Pet and Allergy Upgrade Kit
reviews.reviewText: As others have noted, this is THE solution for the Neato on carpets. The default roller does a pitiful job on carpets and is incredibly loud on hard floors. This upgrade addresses both issues - now if only it didn't cost so much...
reviews.title: Does what you want, plus more

reviews.name: Neato Robotics XV Series Pet and Allergy Upgrade Kit
reviews.reviewText: I installed this on my old Neato XV-11. From the minute it started vacuuming, I could see the difference. Works great on carpet and hard floors. The vac USED to sometimes get stuck where the hard floors meet the carpet, but I think this kits adds a little more traction to the vac, (an unintentional benefit).
reviews.title: great upgrade for neato vacs
